title: что должно лежать в директории w2c_folder?
body:
`$ ./console_bot.sh        
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/iru/git/chatbot/scripts/../ruchatbot/frontend/console_chatbot.py", line 97, in <module>
    bot = create_chatbot(profile_path, models_folder, w2v_folder, data_folder, args.debugging, chitchat_config=rugpt_chitchat_config)
  File "/home/iru/git/chatbot/ruchatbot/frontend/bot_creator.py", line 51, in create_chatbot
    text_utils.load_embeddings(w2v_dir=w2v_folder, wc2v_dir=None)
  File "/home/iru/git/chatbot/ruchatbot/bot/text_utils.py", line 87, in load_embeddings
    self.word_embeddings.load_w2v_model(p)
  File "/home/iru/git/chatbot/ruchatbot/bot/word_embeddings.py", line 51, in load_w2v_model
    w2v = gensim.models.KeyedVectors.load(w2v_path, mmap='r')
  File "/home/iru/.local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/gensim/utils.py", line 485, in load
    obj = unpickle(fname)
  File "/home/iru/.local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/gensim/utils.py", line 1459, in unpickle
    with open(fname, 'rb') as f:
  File "/home/iru/.local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/smart_open/smart_open_lib.py", line 188, in open
    fobj = _shortcut_open(
  File "/home/iru/.local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/smart_open/smart_open_lib.py", line 361, in _shortcut_open
    return _builtin_open(local_path, mode, buffering=buffering, **open_kwargs)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '../tmp/w2v.kv'`
